mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESCRIPTION_LIST ( NO ,PATIENT_NO ,PRESCRIPTION_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRESCRIPTION_LIST_NO.NEXTVAL ,#{no} ,(SELECT NO FROM ( SELECT NO FROM PRESCRIPTION WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY NO DESC ) ) )
mapper.select: SELECT PS.NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION FROM PRESCRIPTION PS JOIN PRESCRIPTION_LIST PL ON PL.PRESCRIPTION_NO = PS.NO JOIN PATIENT P ON P.NO = PL.PATIENT_NO
